channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 西藏航空完成中国商飞40架C919、10架ARJ21飞机订单
item.description: China's Tibet Airlines on Tuesday finalised an order for 40 C919 and 10 ARJ21 jets from COMAC designed to be suitable for high-altitude plateaus, becoming the launch customer for a new variant the Chinese state-owned planemaker is developing.翻译:中国西藏航空周二敲定了从中国商飞购买 40 架 C919 和 10 架 ARJ21 喷气式飞机的订单，这些喷气式飞机专为适合高海拔高原而设计，成为这家中国国有飞机制造商正在开发的新型号飞机的启动客户。
item.author: Brenda Goh

item.title: 台湾称中国登上旅游船引发“恐慌”
item.description: The boarding of a Taiwanese tourist boat by China's coast guard near sensitive frontline islands triggered "panic" among Taiwan's people, a government minister said on Tuesday, but Taiwan's military added it was not planning to get involved.翻译:一位政府部长周二表示，中国海警在敏感的前线岛屿附近登上一艘台湾旅游船引发了台湾人民的“恐慌”，但台湾军方补充说，他们不打算介入。
item.author: Yimou Lee, Ben Blanchard

item.title: 埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 的 SpaceX 如何因中国火箭故障而在印度尼西亚大放异彩
item.description: When a Chinese rocket malfunctioned shortly after launch in April 2020, destroying Indonesia's $220 million Nusantara-2 satellite, it was a blow to the archipelago's efforts to strengthen its communication networks. But it presented an opportunity for one man.翻译:2020 年 4 月，一枚中国火箭发射后不久出现故障，摧毁了印度尼西亚耗资 2.2 亿美元的 Nusantara-2 卫星，这对该群岛加强通信网络的努力是一个打击。但这为一个人提供了一个机会。
item.author: Stefanno Sulaiman, Devjyot Ghoshal, Joe Brock

item.title: 中国下调抵押贷款参考利率以重振房地产市场
item.description: China announced its biggest ever reduction in the benchmark mortgage rate on Tuesday, as authorities sought to prop up the struggling property market and broader economy.翻译:中国周二宣布有史以来最大幅度的基准抵押贷款利率下调，当局试图支撑陷入困境的房地产市场和更广泛的经济。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 外交部长表示中方愿与欧盟共同维护自由贸易和多边主义
item.description: China is ready to work with the European Union to uphold free trade, practice multilateralism, and promote an equal and orderly multi-polar world and inclusive economic globalisation, its foreign minister said during a visit to Spain.翻译:中国外交部长在访问西班牙时表示，中方愿同欧盟一道，维护自由贸易，践行多边主义，推动平等有序的多极化世界和包容性经济全球化。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 一些滞留的俄罗斯索科尔石油货物开始运往中国、印度——数据
item.description: Three tankers with Russian Sokol oil that had been stranded at sea due to payment problems and Western sanctions have started to move towards China and India, data from Kpler and LSEG showed on Monday.翻译:Kpler 和 LSEG 周一的数据显示，因付款问题和西方制裁而搁浅在海上的三艘载有俄罗斯索科尔石油的油轮已开始驶向中国和印度。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 关于Currys，英国连锁店中国京东和美国基金Elliott争夺
item.description: Currys shares soared on Monday after Chinese online retailer JD.com joined U.S. activist investor Elliott Advisors in a battle to buy the British home appliance and electronics retailer, which has already rebuffed Elliott's 700 million pound ($881.79 million) opening bid.翻译:周一，中国在线零售商京东与美国维权投资者埃利奥特顾问公司 (Elliott Advisors) 一起竞购这家英国家用电器和电子产品零售商，该公司已经拒绝了埃利奥特 7 亿英镑（8.8179 亿美元）的开盘报价，随后库里股价飙升。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 荷兰政府称中国利用ASML工具寻求军事优势
item.description: Fears that ASML's computer chip equipment will be used for Chinese military ends underlie recent decisions to deny the company export licences, the Dutch trade minister said in answers to questions from parliament.翻译:荷兰贸易部长在回答议会提问时表示，由于担心 ASML 的计算机芯片设备将被用于中国军事目的，最近决定拒绝该公司的出口许可证。
item.author: Toby Sterling

item.title: 梅西连续缺席香港队纪录
item.description: Lionel Messi took to one of China's largest social media platforms on Monday to address speculation over his non-appearance in a recent Inter Miami friendly in Hong Kong.翻译:周一，莱昂内尔·梅西在中国最大的社交媒体平台之一上回应了有关他缺席最近在香港举行的迈阿密国际友谊赛的猜测。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾称中国海警在前线岛屿附近登上台湾船只
item.description: Chinese coast guard personnel briefly boarded a Taiwanese tourist boat near Taiwan-controlled islands next to China's coast on Monday, the government in Taipei said, in an escalation of tensions after China said it would carry out regular patrols.翻译:台北政府表示，中国海岸警卫队人员周一在中国沿海的台湾控制岛屿附近短暂登上了一艘台湾旅游船，中国表示将进行定期巡逻，导致紧张局势升级。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国证券监管机构听取重振市场的建议
item.description: China's securities watchdog said it held a series of seminars on Sunday and Monday with market participants who proposed tighter scrutiny of company listings and trading behaviour as part of efforts to revive market confidence.翻译:中国证监会表示，周日和周一与市场参与者举行了一系列研讨会，建议对公司上市和交易行为进行更严格的审查，以重振市场信心。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：土耳其与俄罗斯的贸易受到美国新制裁威胁的打击
item.description: A U.S. threat to hit financial firms doing business with Russia with sanctions has chilled Turkish-Russian trade, disrupting or slowing some payments for both imported oil and Turkish exports, according to seven sources familiar with the matter.翻译:据七名知情人士透露，美国威胁要对与俄罗斯有业务往来的金融公司实施制裁，这导致土耳其与俄罗斯之间的贸易降温，导致进口石油和土耳其出口的部分付款受到干扰或放缓。
item.author: Can Sezer, Nevzat Devranoglu, Dmitry Zhdannikov

item.title: 航空集团首席执行官支持波音首席执行官解决安全危机
item.description: Boeing's CEO Dave Calhoun is the right person to lead the company out of its latest safety crisis, after a panel blew out of a 737 MAX 9 plane in flight last month, the head of the world's biggest airline trade body said on Monday.翻译:全球最大的航空贸易机构负责人周一表示，上个月一架正在飞行的 737 MAX 9 飞机的面板发生爆炸，波音公司首席执行官戴夫·卡尔霍恩 (Dave Calhoun) 是领导该公司走出最新安全危机的合适人选。
item.author: Lisa Barrington, Joe Brock

item.title: 欧盟对 TikTok 可能存在的网络内容违规展开正式调查
item.description: The European Union will investigate whether ByteDance's TikTok breached online content rules aimed at protecting children and ensuring transparent advertising, an official said on Monday, putting the social media platform at risk of a hefty fine.翻译:一名官员周一表示，欧盟将调查字节跳动旗下 TikTok 是否违反了旨在保护儿童和确保广告透明的在线内容规则，这使得该社交媒体平台面临巨额罚款的风险。
item.author: Foo Yun Chee

item.title: 报道称，Stellantis考虑在意大利生产零跑电动汽车
item.description: Stellantis is considering building up to 150,000 low-cost electric vehicles (EVs) in Italy, in its Mirafiori complex in Turin, as part of its agreements with Chinese automaker Leapmotor , Automotive News Europe said on Monday.翻译:据《欧洲汽车新闻》周一报道，作为与中国汽车制造商零跑汽车达成的协议的一部分，Stellantis 正在考虑在意大利都灵的 Mirafiori 工厂生产多达 15 万辆低成本电动汽车 (EV)。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 尽管安全关系紧张，印度在马尔代夫的项目仍在加快步伐
item.description: India has stepped up development assistance to the Maldives with projects gaining pace last year, even as ties have soured over new Maldivian President Mohamed Muizzu's demand for Indian troops to leave his country.翻译:印度加大了对马尔代夫的发展援助力度，去年项目步伐加快，尽管马尔代夫新总统穆罕默德·穆伊祖要求印度军队离开马尔代夫，两国关系恶化。
item.author: Krishn Kaushik

item.title: 中国自六月以来首次下调抵押贷款参考利率
item.description: China is widely expected to trim its benchmark mortgage reference rate at a monthly fixing on Tuesday, as banks' improving net interest margins give authorities some leeway to use monetary stimulus to shore up faltering economy growth.翻译:人们普遍预计，中国将于周二将基准抵押贷款参考利率下调至月度固定利率，因为银行净息差的改善使当局有一定的余地，可以利用货币刺激措施来支撑步履蹒跚的经济增长。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商小鹏汽车将雇佣 4,000 名员工，投资人工智能
item.description: Chinese electric vehicle maker Xpeng said it would hire 4,000 this year and invest millions in artificial intelligence, as it seeks to survive what it describes as a "bloody sea" of competition in the world's largest auto market.翻译:中国电动汽车制造商小鹏汽车表示，今年将雇佣 4,000 名员工，并在人工智能领域投资数百万美元，以求在全球最大汽车市场的“血海”竞争中生存下来。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：中国市场看起来需要另一个假期
item.description: A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.翻译:韦恩·科尔 (Wayne Cole) 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。
item.author: Wayne Cole

item.title: 中国京东与美国埃利奥特争夺英国咖喱
item.description: Currys shares soared on Monday after Chinese online retailer JD.com joined U.S. activist investor Elliott Advisors in a battle to buy the British electricals group, which has already rejected Elliott's opening bid of $880 million.翻译:周一，中国在线零售商京东与美国维权投资者 Elliott Advisors 一起竞购这家英国电气集团，该公司已经拒绝了 Elliott 8.8 亿美元的开盘报价，随后库里股价飙升。
item.author: Sarah Young
